title: Login Server still not responding??

replies.body:
I'm not sure what knowledge base articles you've already worked through, but most login issues are caused by a few factors. In most cases, Internet Explorer settings or network settings conflict with your ability to log in. I recommend checking out our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) if you haven't already.

Let me know if those steps helped.

>If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article:[ support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201761944
](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201761944)
>Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.riotgames.com

:( I just wanna play. {{item:3070}} {{champion:90}} {{item:3070}}

There are likely deeper network settings that are directly affecting this, therefore we'll want to ensure all your local network settings are good. You can do this by visiting our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps that specifically target your network configuration.

Let me know if these were able to help.
